synonyms: mathurā-padmera—of the lotus flower of Mathurā; paścima-dale—on the western petal; yāṅra—whose; vāsa—residence; hari-deva—Lord Harideva; nārāyaṇa—incarnation of Nārāyaṇa; ādi—original; parakāśa—manifestation.
translation: Harideva is an incarnation of Nārāyaṇa, and His residence is on the western petal of the lotus of Mathurā.
